companyName: The Ivanor Law Firm - Orlando, FL
description: Attorney Carlos A. Ivanor, has been a licensed attorney in Florida since 2005. He was a former Prosecutor at the Attorney General's Office. Along, with being a former Prosecutor, he was also employed for five years as an Assistant Public Defender in Orange County, Florida. During his legal career he has been able to resolve thousands of cases via plea negotiations and via litigation at trial. He has worked on hundreds of DUI cases to full resolution. He understands the stress that an accused is going through and will assist you in your moment of need. Let Carlos handle your stress and fight to resolve your case. At trial, Carlos will zealously advocate on behalf of his clients and will always seek the best possible resolution for you. In prior occasions, Carlos forced the City of Orlando to place a sign in a major intersection due to his outstanding work on a DUI case, the client's case was eventually tossed out of Court due to his arguments in the case. Attorney Carlos Ivanor has been recognized as a top 100 national trial lawyer and has a perfect 10 rating with AVVO. Contact us today for your free legal consultation.
